data.name: EVE Online: Bronze Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Steam Created Accounts Only

This content can only be accessed with EVE Online accounts created through Steam. Existing EVE Online accounts not created through Steam cannot benefit from it.


About the Game

Launch your space adventure with the Bronze Starter Pack to get 7 days of Omega Time so you can train faster and fly more ships. You’ll also be getting 100,000 Skill Points to boost your training in the skills you need right now, as well as Semiotique Superluminal SKINs for four popular frigates!

Pick up the Bronze Starter Pack today and get your space career off to a flying start.

Pack Contents:

  • 7 Days of Omega - Train faster, do more!
  • 100,000 Skill Points - Your fast track to improved skills
  • Punisher Semiotique Superluminal SKIN
  • Merlin Semiotique Superluminal SKIN
  • Incursus Semiotique Superluminal SKIN
  • Rifter Semiotique Superluminal SKIN

Single purchase per account.

data.short_description: Launch your space adventure with 7 Days Omega time, 100,000 Skill Points, and four stunning SKINS!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, Russian*, French*, Korean*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB or higher
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB Free Space
  • Video: AMD Radeon 5450 or NVIDIA GeForce 420 or better with at least 1024 MB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection (or faster)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.6 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or greater
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB free space
  • Video: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection or faster

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Supported OS: Mac OS X 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 2.5 GHz | Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB Free Space
  • Video: Intel HD 4000
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 12
  • Processor: Intel i7 Series @ 3.8 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or higher
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB free space
  • Video: AMD Radeon Pro 5700 or better with at least 8 GB VRAM

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy EVE Online: Bronze Starter Pack
